title: logo using a "v"
content:
Hi all,

Does anyone can point me any good examples of logotypes using only the “v” character?  
I’m trying to draw a logo based on a “v” right now, and it’s not going as smooth as i suposed to...

Best Regards

 [‹ An old science typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015213400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46125 "Go to previous forum topic") [German text face wanted ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015213400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45950 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kiko

comments.content:

A farthing o’ cheese to choke him.  
A pint of beer to rinse it down.  
A \*\*\*\* of sticks to burn him.
